alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 14 at 3:03AM EDT until March 15 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 to 31 possible. * WHERE...In Georgia, Jenkins and Screven Counties. In South Carolina, Allendale, Hampton, Inland Colleton, Dorchester and Inland Berkeley Counties. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be at or below freezing for 3 to 5 hours, with patchy to areas of frost to also occur.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton
